text: The reciprocal of what quantity was estimated to be .9 higher than the three-digit integer value popularly associated with it in 1916 experiments conducted by a Brandenburg-based researcher? That researcher also hosted Ho Zah-wei ( 何泽慧 ) in his home; she would later go on to lead the neutron flux team of the Chinese nuclear program.
A Chinese researcher based in Brandenburg estimated that the reciprocal of what quantity was estimated to be 0.9 higher than a three digit integer?
